writings.text: 江戸のかたきを長崎で討つ
江戸の仇を長崎で討つ
江戸の敵を長崎で討つ

readings.text: えどのかたきをながさきでうつ

furigana.reading: えどのかたきをながさきでうつ

glossary: to attack the Edo enemy in Nagasaki
to get revenge on someone in a different contest
to hit someone where they least expect it
to take revenge on someone in an unlikely place
